thread.title: Sensex Ends Higher On Draghi Stimulus Comments; Idea Slumps 7%
thread.title_full: Sensex Ends Higher On Draghi Stimulus Comments; Idea Slumps 7%

title: Sensex Ends Higher On Draghi Stimulus Comments; Idea Slumps 7%
text:
Nifty 8,295.45 43.75 [0.53%] The Sensex ended the day with gains of - points, while the Nifty rallied - points in trade. Among the top Sensex gainers was index heavyweight ITC. Oil and Gas stocks were in the limelight with ONGC, Gail and Cairn India leading the gainers.
Among Nifty stocks that lost ground were Maruti, Larsen and Toubro, Wipro and Vedanta. But, the biggest loser from the Nifty was Idea Cellular, which lost a huge 7.5%, following results that disappointed investors. 
Banking stocks had a good session in trade with private sector names like Axis Bank, ICICI Bank and HDFC Bank among the top gainers. State Bank of India and Canara Bank were the leading gainers from the Public Sector Banking space. 
Midcap stocks were subdued for a second trading session in a row with the index closing the day flat. Among the stocks that lost ground from the mid cap space were Concor, which lost a huge 8 per cent, while Mphasis and Suzlon were the other losers. 
GoodReturns.in
